scripts.dev:cssbridge: mm cssbridge --kit react; mv -f src/react.var.css src/cssbridge; mv -f src/magix.var.css src/cssbridge
scripts.build: rm -fr build/*; npm-run-all -p build:tsc build:umd build:cssbridge
scripts.build:cssbridge: mkdir build/umd; cleancss --output ./build/umd/react.var.css ./src/cssbridge/react.var.css --format beautify; cleancss --output ./build/umd/react.var.min.css ./src/cssbridge/react.var.css; cleancss --output ./build/umd/magix.var.css ./src/cssbridge/magix.var.css --format beautify; cleancss --output ./build/umd/magix.var.min.css ./src/cssbridge/magix.var.css;
scripts.publish: def publish --prod; yarn run build; tnpm publish;
scripts.start:react-caller: cd examples/react-caller && yarn install && yarn start;
scripts.start:react-callee: cd examples/react-callee && yarn install && yarn start;
scripts.start:magix-caller: cd examples/magix-caller && yarn install && yarn start;
scripts.start:magix-callee: cd examples/magix-callee && yarn install && yarn start;
